department: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
short_summary: Maritime containers (PHL) acquisition and DELIVERY at Valcartier, Québec, Canada
description: The Department of National Defence, through Public Works and Government Services, invites you to participate in the Request for Proposal (RFP) for acquisition and DELIVERY of Maritime Containers (PHL) located in Valcartier, Québec, Canada.
